text: @vv_1BlueLiberal I’m not going either, I live in a metro area here and I’ll continue eating at home, it’s healthier I’m so many ways anyway, mostly though to avoid Covid19 when I go for a walk in my neighborhood I wear a mask, change clothes and shower so I’m a real psycho!
